title: Starbucks Faces Online Uproar in China After Coffee Price Hike
sub_head: The increase of up to 32 cents for a cup comes after the U.S. coffee giant reported slower sales in China and faced a nationalist backlash
body:
HONG KONGâ€”A 30-cent price increase for a cup of Grande Americano by Starbucks Corp. this week in China sparked an online uproar, the latest setback that the coffee brand faces in its largest market outside of the U.S.
Seattle-based Starbucks on Wednesday raised the prices for some beverages and food in China by 1-2 yuan, or 16-32 cents, the first time in more than three years, following its hikes in the U.S. that it attributed to pandemic-induced cost pressures.
